trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when one or more errors occur during composition in a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Representerar det undantag som utlöses när en eller flera fel uppstår under sammansättning i en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> class with the specified collection of composition errors.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"> </xref> klass med den angivna samlingen med sammansättningsfel.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> objects that represent problems during composition.
trans-unit.target: En samling <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"> </xref> objekt som representerar problem under sammansättning.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"> </xref> klass med angivna felmeddelandet.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Ett meddelande som beskriver den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"> </xref> eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> att ange den <xref:System.Exception.Message*>egenskapen till standardvärdet.</xref:System.Exception.Message*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> class with the specified error message and the exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"> </xref> klass med angivna felmeddelandet och undantag som är orsaken till det här undantaget.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Ett meddelande som beskriver den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"> </xref> eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> att ange den <xref:System.Exception.Message*>egenskapen till standardvärdet.</xref:System.Exception.Message*>

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the underlying cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Undantaget är den underliggande orsaken till den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"> </xref> eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> att ange den <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> objects that describe the errors associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger en samling <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"> </xref> objekt som beskriver de fel som är associerade med den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> objects that describe the errors associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En samling <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"> </xref> objekt som beskriver de fel som är associerade med den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett meddelande som beskriver undantaget.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains the initial sources of this exception.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en samling som innehåller inledande datakällor för det här undantaget.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the initial sources of this exception.
trans-unit.target: En samling som innehåller inledande datakällor för det här undantaget.
